speaker: Dream Therapist
dialog: So what brings you here today?

speaker: lucy
dialog: I've been having weird dreams, ones that feel too real.

speaker: lucy
dialog: I keep hearing a voice calling out to me, but I can never seem to reach it. It always repeats the same words 'SAVE ME'.

speaker: lucy
dialog: I chase after the voice, but right when I think I'm close, I wake up.

speaker: lucy
dialog: I feel like a part of me is stuck there.

speaker: Dream Therapist
dialog: Maybe you can go in there and find out the problem.
